About.question: How many fixed deposits can I open?
About.answer: If your KYC is verified, you can open as many fixed deposits as you wish. However, till your KYC is under process, you can place only one order for opening a fixed deposit.

About.question: What is the minimum/maximum tenure for opening a fixed deposit?
About.answer:
You can choose any tenure between 7 days and 10 years. 

It also depends on the products offered by the bank.

About.question: What is the minimum/maximum amount for opening a fixed deposit?
About.answer:
The amount for opening a fixed deposit may vary based on the type of fixed deposit.

Please refer to the â€˜Deposit Detailsâ€™ section of any fixed deposit for more information.

About.question: What are tax-saver deposits?
About.answer:
Tax-saver deposits are a type of fixed deposits. 

If you invest in tax-saver deposits, you can get tax deductions of up to Rs.1.5 lakh in a financial year under section 80C of the Income Tax Act. 

The lock-in period for tax-saver deposits is 5 years (minimum).

About.question: The bank has changed the interest rates. Will that be applicable to my existing deposit?
About.answer:
No. FD is locked at a specific rate. You will continue to receive that rate till maturity. 

If you wish to avail the new rate, you need to invest in a new fixed deposit.

Getting Started.question: How to access to FD investing on Groww?
Getting Started.answer:
We are gradually rolling out FD on Groww to all our users. 

If you want access to fixed deposit (FD) investment on Groww, please fill the form by pressing the button below.

Getting Started.question: How much time does it take to open a fixed deposit?
Getting Started.answer:
Opening a fixed deposit is subject to KYC verification. 

Usually, it gets verified the same day as the payment or the next working day.

Getting Started.question: Do I need a savings account with the bank for opening a fixed deposit?
Getting Started.answer: No, you can open a fixed deposit with any of the available banks on Groww without having any prior relationship or a savings account with that bank.

Getting Started.question: Can I import my external fixed deposits into Groww?
Getting Started.answer: Currently, we do not have that feature. We will notify you if external fixed deposit importing is introduced on Groww.

Getting Started.question: Can I register nominee for my FD?
Getting Started.answer: Yes, you can register a nominee while onboarding for fixed deposits.

Eligibility.question: What is the eligibility for senior citizens fixed deposits?
Eligibility.answer: Any individual above 60 years of age on the date of issuance of the fixed deposit will be considered as a senior citizen and will be eligible to avail higher interest rates.

Eligibility.question: Who is eligible to invest in FDs through Groww?
Eligibility.answer: A resident individual with more than 18 years of age as on date of application is eligible to invest FDs.

Eligibility.question: My issue is not listed here.
Eligibility.answer: You can try searching for your issue. Alternatively you can raise a ticket with us. Our Customer Support champs will help you out in no time!
